definition: melon seed/seeds of pumpkin, watermelon or sunflower etc, roasted and flavored, consumed as a snack
papaya (Carica papaya)/genus Chaenomeles of shrubs in the family Rosaceae/Chinese flowering quince (Chaenomeles speciosa)
wax gourd (Cucurbitaceae, Benincasa hispida)/white gourd/white hairy melon/Chinese squash
bitter melon (bitter gourd, balsam pear, balsam apple, leprosy gourd, bitter cucumber)
lit. to follow the vine to get to the melon/to track sth following clues

sentences.english: My chamber pot is in the form & size of a Hubbard squash.
sentences.chinese: 我的尿壺是根據古巴瓜的形狀大小而作。

sentences.english: Would I want to be like a gourd, only hung but never eaten.
sentences.chinese: 我又怎麼能像個匏瓜一樣，總是掛着，不被人採食。

sentences.english: The inside of this kind of melon is yellow and tastes very good.
sentences.chinese: 這種瓜的瓜瓤是黃色的，味道也不錯。

sentences.english: Each saw the plate melon, I immediately opened the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 每一看到那盤瓜，我頓時食慾大開。

sentences.english: Mom had a lot of melon on her hands.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽手上拿着許多隻黃金瓜。
南瓜是一種瓜，不代表顏色。

sentences.english: Me: Do you know you are a goosie?
Objective To determine the inorganic elements contents and pesticide residues of Shandong genuine Trichosanthes kirilowii.
sentences.chinese: 目的檢測山東道地藥材瓜蔞中無機元素和農藥殘留量。

sentences.english: But here is a melon in Xinjiang local people love to eat fruit.
sentences.chinese: 但這裏的瓜也是新疆人本地愛喫的瓜。

sentences.english: But here is a melon in Xinjiang local people love to eat fruit.
sentences.chinese: 但這裏的瓜也是新疆人本地愛喫的瓜。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Gualou Gancao Granules(GLGC)on influenza virus pneumonia mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察瓜蔞甘草顆粒對流感病毒肺炎小鼠的影響。

sentences.english: It looks like an oval melon with horns, hence the name.
sentences.chinese: 看上去就像長了很多角的圓形瓜，因此而得名。

sentences.english: Is everything coming to fruition or to wither without anything?
sentences.chinese: 到底是瓜熟地落還是枯黃凋落？

sentences.english: And brought home some zucchinis from the local farmer's market.
sentences.chinese: 從本地農夫市場帶回一些義大利瓜。

sentences.english: The Turpan grapes, Hami melons and Ili apples are all the best.
sentences.chinese: 吐魯番的葡萄，哈密的瓜，伊犁的蘋果頂呱呱。

sentences.english: They are related to melons, cucumbers and squashes.
sentences.chinese: 與他們相關的是各種各樣的瓜，黃瓜等。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
see 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]
